snippet.title: Nick Bounty: A Case Of The Crabs! - Original (PC) |Longplay - Walkthrough - Gameplay| No Commentary
snippet.description:
Welcome to my - Longplay - Walkthrough - Gameplay - video of Nick Bounty: A Case Of The Crabs! The original version on PC - Windows with no commentary.

You can support my channel here:
► SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/c/NoirStation
► TWITTER: https://twitter.com/The_NoirStation
► Leave a tip using Super Thanks!

Nick Bounty: A Case Of The Crabs! Is a funny, adventure, point and click video game. Developed and published by Pinhead Games in 2004. Initially made as a flash game on the internet, but later remade as a fully fledged title in 2020. (Look for - Nick Bounty: A Case Of The Crabs! Rehash!) Story follows the main protagonist, a goofy detective named Nick Bounty who is investigating the counterfeit crab case. 

NoirStation Rating: - 3 Out Of 5 - A very good game and a homage to the classic point and click titles. However, this is a rare instance where I prefer the remake or better known as the rehash version. I just like the simplistic, straight to the point game mechanics of the modern point and click games. Rather than the old school multi optional interface. Also the remake feels more lively with better dialogues, richer world, and so on, you've got the point.

Video Chapters:
Nick's Office - 00:00:00
Shiny Barnacle - 00:02:54
Nick's Office 2 - 00:05:05
Blue Crab Cafe - 00:05:45
The Boss - 00:09:18
Blue Crab Cafe And Jim's Shack O' Crabs - 00:10:55
The Boss 2 - 00:13:49

This video is recorded, played in my style, and edited by me. Longplay is made as fluid as possible without any deaths, unnecessary menus, loading screens, stumbling around or other non-essential things to a walkthrough. So that the video can be used as an easy to follow guide for educational, preservational or entertainment purposes. Review and description is written by me as well. All gaming videos on my channel are my original content which I create myself.
